> but where can I call these methods?


These methods are automatically called by the JUnit runner (TextUI or 
SwingUI).  You don't have to do anything for JUnit to invoke these methods.

> The way you say you need it to be done is how JUnit works.


it means that the problems are in your testcases and not in JUnit.  Send 
me PRIVATELY one of your testcase so I can have a look at it.

-Vladimir
